column5: Hello  Does anyone know where you can buy the material used to make rod gloves? I dont want to use it for that, i want to use it to wrap my cords used for my gps on the boat. Is there something better to use ( i dont want to use heat wrap that is what i am replacing)  Thanks in advance
The product I use is called tech-flex. I use it to dress up single cables or groups of cables. I think I picked mine up online.

You can also use split loom or spiral wrap. Split loom is the ribbed plastic tubing that is split down the center.    This is what spiral wrap looks like.    Here I used it to secure the wiring behind the dash of my boat when I rebuilt it.
http://vrxfishing.com/the-e-cable-glove.html  They sell a kit, has a few small pieces. Thats what i used.
